snippet.title: Another Crab's Treasure - Release Date Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2024
snippet.description:
One crab's trash is another crab's treasure in this underwater Soulslike adventure coming to Nintendo Switch, as well as Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, PC, and PlayStation 5 on April 25, 2024. Fight against a variety of crustacean bosses using found weapons and umami magic in your hunt for a replacement shell.

#IGN #Nintendo #AnotherCrabsTreasure
